text: I've applied for this position on Nov 20th, but didn't hear from them. :slightly_smiling_face:

We are hiring - and offering jobs in one of the most beautiful regions in Germany. Come and "live" with us in Sonthofen near Munich. Together with a team of over 20 developers we focus on HubSpot. We are looking for HubSpot consulants as well as full stack developers.
If interested, just contact me directly :sunglasses:

We are hiring a HubSpot CMS expert! :HubSpotheart:
Freelancer or part-time job to improve our Website.
Would love to see experience in *SaaS*.
And of course you need to be an expert of HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Contact me directly.
<@U01AKKDJN1Y> I'll ask about that! Thanks for letting me know.
Oh! Great! Thank you so much <@U01DG96K18T>
